title: Diazo Print, "Design for a Direct Mail Brochure for the Herman Miller Furniture Company", ca. 1957
signed: Imprinted lower right: April 22, '58 Alexander Girard
inscribed: Imprinted, upper left side: 71 wallpapers in / 11 patterns / dsigned by / alexander / girard for / herman miller at $8.00 each. Imprinted lower left: The Herman Miller furniture co. / textile and wallpaper division / zeeland michigan. Imprinted upper left in margin: picture of book [and placement indicated with arrow]; Imprinted center right: please enter my order for / herman miller wallpaper / sample books at $8.00 each / name: / address:; Imprinted in margins where appropriate: customer address; stamp [placement indicated with arrow]
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
description: Two large vertical rectangles delineated left and right with fold line indicated aacross center of sheet

tombstone.epitaph: Diazo Print, "Design for a Direct Mail Brochure for the Herman Miller Furniture Company", ca. 1957.Blueprint on off-white wove paper. Gift of Alexander H. Girard. 1969-165-269.
